name: Learn To Cook!
description: Keep your parents at bay (and away from your apartment) by proving to them that you know how to cook! Move around with WASD, and interact with your ingredients with [SPACE]. Adding the right combination serves a delicious meal that reassures them of your maturity, but one wrong move and they might stick around for longer than you hoped for. A cute and simple game about growing up, learning to do new things, and keeping parental figures satisfied.
